We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters. a significant step back to superstardom: His first endorsement deal since his return to the NFL in 2009. The deal is with Unequal Technologies, a company that makes football pads Michael Vick used this season. Part of the reason I'm here is because I was able to wear some rib protection this season to guide me through my injury, said Michael Vick , who missed three games with a rib injury sustained Oct. 3. legislation and federal appointments. The binding resolution, which passed 92-4, requires public disclosure within two days of an objection being made by any senator to Senate action on legislation or nominations. Passage of this resolution is a victory for accountability. It will establish transparency with the significant power each senator holds to stop legislation and nominations, Chuck Grassley said.- Tom Latham Beaumont Mike Pence won't run, for president anyway Caucus junkies confounded by the late formal start of campaigning but long lists of possible candidates can cross
